sentences.sentence: Small town became a town between one night, old wish came true, then, town of 3 fork river increased at a draught very, centesimal lively.
sentences.translation: 小镇一夜之间变成了县城，多年的愿望实现了，于是，三岔河镇一下子便增加了十分、百分的热闹。
